Sentencas: Different cell configurations of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells (mT-SOFCs) using samaria-doped ceria (SDC) as the electrolyte were fabricated.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: Several cells were processed varying the porosity and wall thickness (outer diameter) of NiO-SDC tubular supports.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: Suitable aqueous slurry formulations of NiO-SDC for gel-casting were prepared using agarose, as a gelling agent, and sucrose, as a pore former.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: The subsequent NiO-SDC anode functional layer (AFL), the SDC electrolyte and the La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta-SDC cathode were deposited by spray-coating.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: Afterwards, the electrochemical performance of different single cells was tested under humidified hydrogen as the fuel and air as the oxidant.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: The mechanical strength of the supporting tubes at different processing stages (green, pre-/post-sintering, post-reduction, post-redox cycle conditions) were also determined to study the macromechanical failure behaviour of the cells.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: In addition, the mechanical strength of half-cells with different porosity, sintering temperature and wall thickness in the tubular supports was also determined.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: For this purpose, the modulus of rupture was measured by a three point bending test.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties

Sentencas: This study shows that the electrochemical properties and mechanical strength are feasible for further development of anode-supported mT-SOFCs fabricated by gel-casting.
Titulo: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by gel-casting: the role of supporting microstructure on the mechanical properties
